full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,MCHOD PA'I DMIGS RIM DANG 'DON CHA ZAS KYI RNAL 'BYOR SOGS LA BSLAB TSUL KHUN BZANG MCHOD SPRIN ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @012A *, ,(ZHES PA 'DI NI RI KHROD PA MANG PO TSOGS NAS MCHOD PA 'BUL BA'I SKABS SU JI LTAR BSLAB PA'I RIM PA YI GER BRIS PA 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES, ^DPON SLOB ZHVA DMAR TSANG NAS BSKUL BA LTAR, ^GSER KHANG RI KHROD PAS BRIS PA DZA YANTU,)
